resources.string: 30 Days Of Wellness
Go to the cinema.
Hang out with friends.
Eat a big pizza.
Read an interesting book.
Watch a good film.
Go to the park.
Create an App in a course.
Swim in pool.
Ride a bike.
Buy something new to home.
Say 10 wishes and write in to wishes book.
Go to gym.
Eat a tasty cake.
Do some sports.
Go to journey.
Listen to a new audiobook.
Take a 15 min meditation.
Wake up at 8 am.
Go sleep at 10 pm.
Clean your room.
Go to the museum.
Take a fresh salad.
Write an ease about a good thing.
Watch comedy.
Do the best gift for somebody .
Make a surprise for somebody.
Try to sleep in the middle of a day.
Cook something new for yourself.
Make a coffee.
Enjoy every moment of this day.
Go to the cinema to watch interesting new movies.
Go out with friends, it will help you to be in good company and you can relax.
If you eat a big and delicious pizza, you will be in a good mood for the whole day, because pizza is cool.
A good book always helps in difficult situations, distracts from bad thoughts.
You will remember an interesting film for a long time.
A walk in the park will relax you and allow you to enjoy nature and solitude with it.
Creating an application in the Android development course will make your life easier, because you will not have to go to the exam.
Swimming in the pool is good for your back and posture, and also helps to keep your body in good shape.
Cycling will also help keep your body in good shape and strengthen your heart..
Shopping at home always brings joy and enjoyment from it.
A good motivation to do something, make your most cherished wishes and write them down, and then go ahead to realize.
The gym will help keep your body in good shape, as well as strengthen your muscles and make you more attractive.
A delicious cake will cheer you up for a long time.
It will help keep your body in good shape.
A change of environment has a positive effect on the moral and physical condition.
The audiobook will relax you and you will be able to immerse yourself in the world of short stories and fantastic stories.
Meditation will allow you to immerse yourself in yourself and understand your spiritual state.
Getting up at 8 a.m. contributes to a productive working day.
If you go to bed at 10 p.m., then you will fully restore your body overnight and get enough sleep.
Cleaning the room will help you breathe freshness in the apartment, as well as give it a beautiful look.
Going to a museum helps to set up the mind to study culture and history, besides, there are different museums.
Fresh salad helps to normalize digestive processes in the body, which will have a positive effect on health.
If you write an essay about the good things in your life, then you will start thinking positively and your productivity will increase.
Comedy shows are great for uplifting and improving well-being.
The best gift to a friend or family member will not only unite you even more, but also give you great pleasure.
Everyone loves surprises if they are good. Lift someones mood and it will rise for you too.
Daytime sleep helps to get the most energy out of the current day, try it.
Cooking has always been an interesting activity, cook something unusual, experiment.
Make yourself a coffee, because it activates your thought processes and helps you recharge for the rest of the daye.
Every new day is an amazing event, because you never know what it will bring you. Enjoy it.
